short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the festive glow of a Christmas tree with twinkling lights on your new tab page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the enchanting glow of the holiday season to your browser with the Christmas Tree Lights Live Wallpaper Chrome extension. Adorn your new tabs with a sparkling Christmas tree, surrounded by a warm, festive ambiance that captures the spirit of the holidays.

Features:
🎄 Beautifully lit Christmas tree with vibrant, twinkling lights.
✨ Animated effects that add a magical touch to your browsing experience.
🔍 A customizable search bar for seamless navigation.
🕒 Clock and date display, blending with the holiday theme.
🌐 Quick-access shortcuts to your most-visited sites.
Enhance your holiday spirit every time you open a new tab with this cozy and festive extension!

More extensions: https://gameograf.com/
Contact us: https://gameograf.com/contact-us/
Privacy policy: https://gameograf.com/privacy-policy/
